summary.span: 表示包含一段任意类型内容的控件。

span.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含任何类型的公共语言运行时对象（例如字符串或 对象）或 对象（例如 或 ）。The can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a object) or a object (such as a or a ). 这使你能够向控件（如 和 ）添加丰富的内容。This enables you to add rich content to controls such as and . 下图显示了四个按钮，其 属性设置为以下其中一项：The following illustration shows four buttons whose property is set to one of the following: - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个包含其他 对象的 控件。A control that contains other objects. ![四个按钮](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四个按钮")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") 具有不同类型的内容的四个按钮Four buttons with different types of content 具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 如果要增强控件的外观，可以创建新的 。If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). 另一种典型方案是使用 显示有关在 控件中选定的项的详细信息。Another typical scenario is to use the to show more information about an item selected in an control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：绑定到集合并基于选择显示信息](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection)。For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建显示在 "备注" 部分中的四个按钮。The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section. > [!NOTE] > 尽管该示例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 版本可以在每个按钮的内容周围使用 `` 标记，但这并不是必需的。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何为 设置样式，使控件具有增强的视觉外观。The following example shows how to make a style for a so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance. [!code-xaml[ContentControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ContentControl#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of a .

value.span: 一个包含控件内容的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the control's content.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 属性的类型为 ，因此不会限制你可以在 中放置的内容。Because the property is of type , there are no restrictions on what you can put in a . 由 显示，该位于 的 中。The is displayed by a , which is in the of the . [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的每个 类型都在其默认 中具有 。Every type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a in its default . 有关 如何显示 的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about how the displays , see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `Content` 文本或单个对象。Text or a single object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建四个 控件，并将 设置为以下其中一项：The following example demonstrates how to create four controls with set to one of the following: - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个包含其他 对象的 控件。A control that contains other objects. > [!NOTE] > 尽管该示例的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 版本可以在每个按钮的内容周围使用 `` 标记，但这并不是必需的。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下图显示了在上一个示例中创建的四个按钮。The following illustration shows the four buttons created in the previous example. ![四个按钮](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四个按钮")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons")

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义的复合字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 如果设置了 的 或 属性，则会忽略 属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例通过设置 中的 属性并将 应用于从 继承的两个 对象，指定 对象的格式。The following example specifies the format of objects by setting the property in a and applying the to two objects, which inherit from . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#ContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#contentcontrol)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 内容的数据模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the data template used to display the content of the .
A data template.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 可指定 的外观。Set this property to a to specify the appearance of the . 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 标识如何引用模板资源的标记扩展（`StaticResource` 或 `DynamicResource`。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 标识所请求模板选择器的键。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建内容模板并将模板应用到内容控件。The following examples show how to create a content template and apply the template to a content control. [!code-xaml[ContentControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[ContentControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个模板选择器，以使应用程序编写器能够提供自定义模板选择逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
A data template selector.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当您有多个 用于相同类型的对象，并且您希望提供自己的逻辑来根据每个数据对象的属性来选择要应用的 时，可以创建 。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意，如果您具有不同类型的对象，则可以设置 上的 属性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果这样做，则无需创建 。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您的对象具有相同类型但具有不同的属性，则还可以考虑使用 或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview). 若要创建模板选择器，请创建一个继承自 的类并重写 方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后，可以将类的实例分配给元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性，则将忽略此属性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 标识如何引用模板资源的标记扩展（`StaticResource` 或 `DynamicResource`。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *TemplateSelectorKey**TemplateSelectorKey* 标识所请求模板选择器的键。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 此示例将 中的选定项绑定到 继承自 的 属性。This example binds the selected item in a to the property of a , which inherits from . 当用户选择低于5的值时，所选项目的值将显示在 的黑色方块中。When the user selects a value below 5, the value of the selected item appears in a black square in the . 当用户选择的值为5或更高时，该值将显示在绿色椭圆中。When the user selects a value that is 5 or above, the value appears in a green ellipse. 该示例通过创建两个 对象和一个 来实现此目的，该对象设置为 属性，并根据选定项的值选择适当的 。The example accomplishes this by creating two objects and a , which is set to the property and chooses the appropriate based on the value of the selected item. [!code-xaml[ContentControlTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ContentControlTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ContentControlTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此 `ShouldSerialize` 方法的原因是 属性没有简单的默认值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 此方法指示属性是否已更改为其默认值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要为 开发设计器或开发包含 的自己的控件，则通常会调用此方法。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
